Package org.apache.openjpa.kernel.jpql

Class JPQLExpressionBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.apache.openjpa.kernel.exps.AbstractExpressionBuilder
org.apache.openjpa.kernel.jpql.JPQLExpressionBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
JPQLTreeConstants
public class JPQLExpressionBuilder extends AbstractExpressionBuilder implements JPQLTreeConstants
Builder for JPQL expressions. This class takes the query parsed in JPQL and converts it to an expression tree using an ExpressionFactory. Public for unit testing purposes.
Author:
Marc Prud'hommeaux, Patrick Linskey

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type

    Base node that will be generated by the JPQLExpressionBuilder; base class of the SimpleNode that is used by JPQL.

    Public for unit testing purposes.

    • convertSubstringArguments

      public static Value convertSubstringArguments(ExpressionFactory factory, Value val1, Value val2, Value val3)
      Converts JPQL substring() function to OpenJPA ExpressionFactory substring() arguments.
      Parameters:
      val1 - the original String
      val2 - the 1-based start index as per JPQL substring() semantics
      val3 - the length of the returned string as per JPQL semantics
